data.text: @TJProvincial So why do people care now? @DominicCardy and @premierbhiggs have been sending our vac’d kids to school alongside the unvac’d since the beginning of this pandemic. Govts are throwing their collective hands up in the air and giving up. Remember - it’s not about the kids. Never is.
@JuanitaMacLean @TJProvincial @DailyGleaner Testing for Covid was a fraud to begin with. What we are seeing now is the same common cold we have been getting every year since you were a child.
@RobertD31953562 @TJProvincial @DailyGleaner Why do you say that? Did you find a place where we can access another source for data on infection rates in schools?
@KingDjangoIV @David12342900 @TJProvincial @TimesTranscript Liberals are so judgemental of people they don't understand. #LiberalismIsAMentalDisease
@andrewwaugh13 @TJProvincial Thanks for the response and the coverage.
@TJProvincial That's good news.  It means it is not the problem it was in 2020.  Time to move on.
@pleadwell @TJProvincial No, there's only an overall number on the EECD website.
